Package uniandes.cupi2.album.world

Class Team

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniandes.cupi2.album.world.Team

  • public class Team
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Team in the album.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Team

        public Team​(java.lang.String pCountry,
            int pYear)
        Creates a new team.
        post: Country and year attributes were initialized with the values given by the parameters.
        List of players was initialized and players were created with the default values.
        Parameters:
        pCountry - Team's country. pCountry != null && pCountry != "".
        pYear - Year in which the team represented the country. pYear > 0.

        Returns:

      • findPlayer

        public Player findPlayer​(int pShirtNumber)
        Returns a player with the shirt number given by the parameter. pre: The list of teams is initialized.
        Parameters:
        pShirtNumber - Player's shirt number. pShirtNumber > 0.
        Returns:
        Player with given shirt number, null if player not found.

      • pasteTeamCard

        public void pasteTeamCard​()
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Pastes the team card.
        post: If the card didn't already exist, a card of type TEAM was initialized with the name of the corresponding image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the card has already been pasted.

      • pasteCrestCard

        public void pasteCrestCard​()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Pastes the team crest card.
        post: If the card didn't already exist, a card of type CREST was initialized with the name of the corresponding image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the card has already been pasted.

      • pastePlayerCard

        public void pastePlayerCard​(int pShirtNumber)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Pastes the card of the player with the shirt number given by the parameter.
        pre: The array that contains the players is initialized. post: If the card didn't already exist, the corresponding player's card was pasted
        Parameters:
        pShirtNumber - Player's shirt number. pShirtNumber > 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the card has already been pasted.

      • countFavoriteCards

        private int countFavoriteCards​()
        Returns the quantity of cards that were marked as favorites.
        pre: The list of players is initialized.
        Returns:
        Number of cards that were pasted in the team.

      • changeFavoriteTeam

        public void changeFavoriteTeam​()
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Changes the status of favorite for a team card.
        post: If the card was a favorite, it changes to not being a favorite and vice versa.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the team already has the maximum allowed amount of favorite cards. If the team doesn't have a card.

      • changeFavoriteCrest

        public void changeFavoriteCrest​()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Changes the status of favorite for a crest card.
        post: If the card was a favorite, it changes to not being a favorite and vice versa.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the team already has the maximum allowed amount of favorite cards. If the crest doesn't have a card.

      • changeFavoritePlayer

        public void changeFavoritePlayer​(int pShirtNumber)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Changes the status of favorite for a player card with the shirt number given by the parameter.
        pre: The list of players is initialized. Specified player exists. post: If the card was a favorite, it changes to not being a favorite and vice versa.
        Parameters:
        pShirtNumber - Player's shirt number. pShirtNumber > 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the team already has the maximum allowed amount of favorite cards.

      • modifyPlayer

        public void modifyPlayer​(int pShirtNumber,
                         int pNewShirtNumber,
                         java.lang.String pName,
                         Player.Position pPosition,
                         int pBirthYear,
                         double pHeight,
                         double pWeight)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Modifies the information of a player with the shirt number given by the parameter. If the new shirt number is already owned by another player, the information isn't modified. pre: The list of players is initialized. Specified player exists.
        post: If the shirt number didn't change(same player) and a player existed with the new shirt number, or if a player with the new shirt number didn't exist and the current shirt number was different from the new shirt number, the player information was modified.
        Parameters:
        pShirtNumber - Player's shirt number. pShirtNumber > 0.
        pNewShirtNumber - New shirt number. pNewShirtNumber > 0.
        pName - New player name. pName != null && pName != "".
        pPosition - New player position.pPosition belongs to {Position.GOALKEEPER, Position.DEFENDER,Position.WINGER,Position.STRIKER, Position.UNKNOWN}.
        pBirthYear - Player's birth year. pBirthYear > 0.
        pHeight - New player height. pHeight > 0.
        pWeight - New player weight. pWeight > 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the the maximum quantity of goalkeepers on the team has been reached. If the the maximum quantity of defenders on the team has been reached. If the the maximum quantity of strikers on the team has been reached. If there is an attempt to modify a player's shirt number, but the new shirt number already belongs to another player. If there is an attempt to modify a player that already has a card pasted.

      • countCardsNotPasted

        public int countCardsNotPasted​(Card.CardType pCardType)
        Returns the quantity of cards yet to be pasted of a card type given by the parameter.
        pre: The list of players is initialized.
        Parameters:
        pCardType - Card type of the cards to be counted. pCardType belongs to {CardType.CREST, CardType.TEAM, CardType.PLAYER}.
        Returns:
        Quantity of cards of given type that haven't been pasted.

      • getMostCommonAge

        public int getMostCommonAge​()
        Returns the mode of the players' ages. If there are multiple ages with the most frequency, return any.
        pre: The list of players is initialized.
        Returns:
        Most common age among the players of the team.

      • countPlayersPosition

        private int countPlayersPosition​(Player.Position pPosition)
        Returns the number of players on the team that play in a position given by the parameter.
        pre: The list of players is initialized.
        Parameters:
        pPosition - New player position.pPosition belongs to {Position.GOALKEEPER, Position.DEFENDER,Position.WINGER,Position.STRIKER, Position.UNKNOWN}..
        Returns:
        The number of players in a position.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString​()
        Return a representation of the team in a string.
        The format must be (country) - (year)
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
